title: New: Dan Croll – Home (Laurel Remix)
content:
Laurel extends her production skills from her own tracks to fellow Turn First artist Dan Croll‘s new single ‘Home’. The result is a world away from the original, with Laurel turning the gentle folky number into a trip-hop dream. Pizzicato strings are teamed with soft synth sounds and a strong beat, with the result resembling the production work of Bonobo and Tourist.

Following tracks like Firebreather and Blue Blood, young Laurel is proving herself as quite a talent.
